readability-redundant-function-ptr-deref.description:
Description

Finds redundant dereferences of a function pointer.

Before:

int
f
(
int
,
int
);
int
(
*
p
)(
int
,
int
)
=
&
f
;
int
i
=
(
**
p
)(
10
,
50
);

After:

int
f
(
int
,
int
);
int
(
*
p
)(
int
,
int
)
=
&
f
;
int
i
=
(
*
p
)(
10
,
50
);
readability-redundant-function-ptr-deref.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
